description:
Learn how to build a simple browser game using JavaScript! We'll review the basics of web development, including HTML and CSS, followed by a deep dive into manipulating the HTML DOM using JavaScript.

No programming experience required, the only thing you'll need is a laptop and a willingness to get stuck in.

Agenda:

* 18:00 - 18:30 Arrival, intros and social
* 18:30 - 20:20 JavaScript Workshop
* 20:20 - 20:30 Wrapping up

Please try to arrive by 18:30 or let us know in advance if you're running late.
title: JavaScript for Beginners - Let's build a game!
